title: Footsteps - Sound Effects
description: Now your character can walk on Grass, Dirt, Stones, Water, and much more!
longDescription:
Hi Dev


By investing in this package you will have access to a good variety of footstep sounds on different types of terrain. (great for NPC'S)


Check the Preview Of the First Update

Check The Preview

Check The Documentation


Variety

In this package you will be able to make your character walk in a large empty hall, branches, carpets, wooden floors, gravel, in slippers, with metal equipment, and more!


Possibilities

Most sounds can also be used in other situations involving small impacts, such as a small UI click, or a small object falling to the ground, ensuring more uses than their original theme.


Helping each other

By investing in this package you are helping a small creator and also bringing all these sounds to you!


Update

I received some really cool feedback that this pack doesn't do that well when it comes to running, and after reviewing the pack I admit I agree, and because of that I would like to be transparent and say that the sounds are great for walking, and you can hear them all before buying, that is, if you have an NPC that moves around, this package will be excellent for you!


And about running, I'll make a new package soon about racing and update this one too
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 667

Number of Audio Cues: 667

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
